about_the_game:
Chorus of Carcosa is a psychological horror game inspired by the classic horror fiction of 'The King in Yellow' collection by R. W. Chambers. You play as a sculptor who is forced to abandon his place of comfort one night, when a blood-soaked neighbor knocks on his door.

KEY FEATURES

  • Three hours of classic horror thriller gameplay

  • Endless tension — finding a way out is no easy task

  • Simple stealth mechanics — try to remain unnoticed when there’s no place to hide

  • Immersive graphics and high-quality 3D sound powered by Unreal Engine 5

  • Carefully written, directed, and voiced by professional actors

Experience the fear of facing the unknown 

Survive an ever-changing decrepit apartment building filled with dangers and mysteries... Without making a sound! Or THEY will hear you…

Solve the mystery of an alternate reality

A twisted realm fills the space around you. Are all of these changes real? Or are they just nightmarish hallucinations?

You can flee, but escape is an illusion

They have found you and there's no turning back now. Perhaps, it’s sometimes wiser to embrace the surrounding madness and stare right back into its eyes

short_description: Chorus of Carcosa is a first-person psychological horror game about an anxious sculptor who is trapped in a dark and ever-changing building. Stay silent, survive its twisted labyrinths and escape the monsters. Just don’t lose your way in the shadows or within your own mind.
